name: Trapped: The Dark Games
description:
DISCLAIMER

The game is far from complete. However, we scrambled to get something thrown together before the submission period ended. We will continue updating the game throughout the remaining rating period.
Also, the custom menu looks different in the web and windows versions of the game.
Due to the limitations of RPG Maker MV's collision detection, the new spike traps have some...interesting flaws.

THE GAME

Daniel Crowe finds himself in some kind of underground facility, with no recollection of how he got there. He must take part in a twisted series of "games" orchestrated by the mysterious and sinister "G.M.", if he has any hopes of surviving and making it back home.

CONTROLS

The game can be played using the keyboard, a game controller, or mouse, though keyboard or game controller are recommended, since mouse clicks might miss important triggers in-game.

CONTROLSKEYBOARDCONTROLLERMOUSEMovementArrow keys, Num padD-padClick destinationActionZ, Enter, SpaceAClick targetCancelX, Esc, Num pad 0BRight clickMenuX, Esc, Num pad 0YRight clickSprintShiftX* Mouse movement
always uses sprinting

TIPS

Examine EVERYTHING in the game. You never know what you might discover.
When picking up an item, try to activate it in the menu to possibly find out something more.
Save early, save often. Daniel has no health stat, and all injuries will prove to be fatal. You have been warned!
